Reviews.Title: Best DVR surveilence system on the market!
Reviews.Author: vsLumberjack
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best DVR system to get for your home security system. I have had the same one now for 6 years and it is incredible. It is entirely automatic and easy connects to any monitor or television. The remote allows me to switch between channels and even my TVs from accross the house. I've had three hooked up at the same time. It made it easy to watch the kids while they played outside while I was sick. I just bought this second one for the shop we bought and I can't wait to get it! Installation is simple and takes no time at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
View live or recorded footage from any computer with Internet Explorer, anywhere in the world (supports DDNS)
Records up to 1.4 years on the removable 320GB Seagate harddrive
CF card backup
Motion activated recording
Connect a microphone to this DVR to record and play back audio
